name: catalina wrap
notes:
a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog [here.][1]

add a touch of romance to your wardrobe with the catalina wrap, a crochet take on the knit cambria wrap. simple lace stitches and bobbles come together to make this easy level design look like a stunning masterpiece. wear it over the shoulders like a shawl or wrap it with the point in front like a scarf – either way it will accent your look with elegance.

shop the full kit [here.][2] 

**sizes**
one size

**finished dimensions**
length to point: 36”/91cm
width: 76”/193cm

**difficulty level**
easy

**skills**
single crochet
double crochet
front post double crochet
bobbles
chaining and skipping stitches
working into chain spaces
the magic loop

all patterns are written in standard us terms.
